title: Lotus Vegetarian Restaurant
description: Vegetarian Vietnamese cuisine. Most menu items are vegan, with only a few exceptions, such as egg noodle. Find spring rolls, soups, salads, hot pot, stir-fry, banh xeo, banh mi, and a few Chinese dishes. There are also a few to-go items for sale at the counter, such as BBQ mock chicken and tofu with mixed vegetables. The lunch special dishes (11am-3pm daily) are vegan and include a spring roll, a bowl of soup, rice, and a main entree.
